topic.title: NHS Continuing Healthcare Eligibility Start Date Following Independent Review
topic.shortdesc: An NHS Continuing Healthcare Eligibility Start Date Following Independent Review is the eligibility Start Date for a PERSON found eligible for NHS Continuing Healthcare following an Independent Review.
